front.title: Republishing the IPV6-MIB modules as obsolete

abstract.t: In 2005, the IPv6 MIB update group published updated versions of the IP-MIB, UDP-MIB, TCP-MIB and IP-FORWARD-MIB modules, which use the InetAddressType/InetAddress construct to handle IPv4 and IPv6 in the same table. This document contains versions of the obsoleted IPV6-MIB, IPV6-TC, IPV6-ICMP-MIB, IPV6-TCP-MIB and IPV6-UDP-MIB modules, for the purpose of updating MIB module repositories.
